hovertext: Margaret Hodge

Miscellaneous

Miscellaneous
£0
Unremunerated member of the Advisory Board of GovernUp, a project to improve the effectiveness of government.
From September 2016, unremunerated Visiting Fellow of Practice at the Blavatnik School of Government at Oxford University.
From June 2015, unremunerated Visiting Professor at King’s College London.
From August 2015, unremunerated member of the Westminster Foundation for Democracy's Board of Governors.
From October 2015, unremunerated member of the Editorial Board of Political Quarterly.
From November 2015, unremunerated Chair of the Board of Directors of the Theatre Royal Stratford East.
From February 2016, unremunerated Co-chair of the Fawcett Society’s Local Government Commission.

Employment
£19,656
12 January 2017, received £1,000 for the serialisation of my book. Hours: no additional hours.
6 April 2017, received £7,175 as a further instalment for my book (published in September 2016). Hours: no additional hours.
14 March 2017, received £250 from Prospect Magazine, 2 Queen Anne’s Gate, London, SW1H 9AA, for an article in the March 2017 issue. Hours: approx. 3 hrs.

24 March 2017 of £131.36 from the Authors' Licensing and Collecting Society, 1st Floor, Barnard's Inn, 86 Fetter Lane, London EC4A 1EN, as secondary royalties on past publications. Hours: no additional hours.
11 October 2016, received £150 from the Cheltenham Literature Festival, 109-111 Bath Road, Cheltenham GL53 7LS, for an appearance to promote my book. Hours: 4 hrs.
11 October 2016, received £150 from the Henley Literature Festival, 36 Hart St, Henley-on-Thames RG9 2AU, for an appearance to promote my book. Hours: 4 hrs.
14 November 2016, received £150 from the Dulwich Literary Festival, Dulwich Books Ltd., 6 Croxted Road, London SE21 8SW, for an appearance to promote my book. Hours: 4 hrs.
11 April 2017, received £150 from the Oxford Literary Festival, Greyfriars Court, Paradise Square, Oxford OX1 1BE, for an appearance to promote my book. Hours: 4 hrs.
26 April 2017, received £9,500 from the Greater London Authority at City Hall, The Queen’s Walk, London, SE1 2AA for leading an inquiry. Hours: approx. 350 hrs.
21 July 2017, received £150 from the Bookcase Festival, 50 Main Street, Lowdham NG14 7BE, for an appearance to promote my book. Hours: 4 hrs.
24 August 2017, received £150 from Buxton International Festival, Festival Office, 3 The Square, Buxton SK17 6AZ, for an appearance to promote my book on 8 July 2017. Hours: 4 hrs.
Payment of £200 expected from the Edinburgh International Book Festival, 5 Charlotte Square, Edinburgh EH2 4DR, for an appearance to promote my book on 28 August 2017. Hours: 4 hrs.
28 August 2017, received £500 from the Holt Festival, c/o Butcher Andrews, 15 Market Place, Holt NR25 6BE, for an appearance to promote my book on 28 July 2017. Hours: 4 hrs.
